M, and L trains, as well as the B32, B62, and Q59 bus routes.

BUILDING FEATURES: Bike Room Courtyard Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Finished Roof Deck First; Security NO FEE

details.description:
Elevated Living at 527 Grand Ave in Prospect Heights
2 bedroom with 2 bath
Welcome to 527 Grand Ave, a luxury community perfectly nestled in the vibrant Prospect Heights neighborhood. Offering 1 and 2 bedroom residences with spacious layouts, premium finishes, and thoughtful design, this property redefines modern living. Tons of natural sunlight throughout.
Residents enjoy unparalleled amenities, including: - A state-of-the-art fitness center - Expansive rooftop terrace with stunning skyline views - Dedicated children?s playroom - Business conference room for remote work and meetings - Convenient elevator access
Neighborhood Highlights: Prospect Heights is a blend of historic charm and contemporary culture. Stroll down tree-lined streets to uncover trendy restaurants, cozy cafes, and boutique shops. The iconic Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, and Brooklyn Museum are just steps away, offering lush green spaces and endless cultural experiences. Excellent transit options, including the A and C trains, make commuting to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn a breeze.
Live where convenience meets character. Schedule your tour today and make 527 Grand Ave your new home!

details.description:
----- Luxury 2 bedroom 1bath, available now ------
Housed in what was formerly known as the Empire State Dairy Company, The Highland is one of Brooklyn?s most recent landmarked buildings. Steeped in rich history, The residence now spans 14 stories and offers Studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes.
Our units feature ? Modern Elegant Kitchens ? Quartz Countertops ? Stainless Steel Appliances ? Panelized Dishwashers ? In-unit washer/dryer ? Floor- to- ceiling windows ? White Oak Flooring ? Mini split heating/cooling system
Bathroom features include ? White Oak Vanities ? Floor-to-ceiling grooved ceramic wall tiles ? Deep soaking tub ? Stone style floor tiles
Our building features ? Laundry room ? Bike Storage ? Resident Lounge ? Business Center ? Kids Playroom ? Fitness Center ? Rooftop Lounge ? Two Outdoor Terraces
Located just south of Highland Park, Cypress Hills is home to passionate individuals who share a strong appreciation for their neighborhood due to its rich and vibrant history, local bars, restaurants, and cafes, and community gardens, parks, and green spaces. Boasting 101 acres, Highland Park is situated on a high plateau and offers stunning views of the Ridgewood Reservoir, Rockaways, and Atlantic Ocean. Additional parks and green spaces include Shirley Chisholm State Park, Hamilton Beach Park, Sperandeo Brothers Playground, the Herbal Garden of East New York, George Walker Jr. Park, Martin Luther King Jr. Playground, Grace Playground, Noakhali Cricket Field, and Sutter Ballfields.

details.description:
Welcome to 1503 Jefferson 1B, an extraordinary duplex apartment that offers the perfect blend of modern luxury and comfortable living. This exceptional 1-bedroom residence comes with a delightful private backyard, allowing you to enjoy a serene outdoor oasis right at your doorstep.
Step inside and be captivated by the sleek kitchen, boasting granite countertops and a paneled dishwasher. The elegant hardwood floors create a warm and inviting atmosphere throughout the apartment, adding a touch of sophistication to every room. Stay connected and secure with the convenient video intercom system, providing peace of mind and convenience.
Feel the comfort of central air conditioning, ensuring a pleasant living environment year-round. Additionally, the building offers storage space for a nominal fee, allowing you to keep your belongings organized and easily accessible. A spacious laundry room caters to your laundering needs, making chores a breeze.
For those with an active lifestyle, the building provides bike storage, allowing you to conveniently store your bicycle securely. Enjoy the perks of a backyard, perfect for relaxation or entertaining guests. But the true gem of the building awaits atop?a beautifully landscaped rooftop terrace with breathtaking panoramic city views, providing a picturesque backdrop for any occasion.
1503 Jefferson 1B is not just an apartment; it's a sanctuary that offers an unparalleled living experience. Come and embrace the epitome of modern living with an abundance of amenities and a location that puts the best of the city at your fingertips.

Expansive 1bed apartment brimming with charm in a prime location. Hardwood floors, oversized windows, and original exposed brick throughout offer an inspiring living space for all of your needs! The kitchen is clean with nicely finished white appliances and cabinets. Great storage throughout the apartment, and the large bedroom in back has a *three* huge windows and a closet.
You'll love the incredible location on one of the most desirable BK Heights blocks. Grab a beverage at the popular Vineapple Cafe right downstairs, and then you're just steps away from Cadman Plaza Park, the Brooklyn Bridge Park+Roller Rink, and everything else in Downtown Brooklyn. Manhattan is just minutes away, with super easy via the 2, 3, and A trains, as well as the Brooklyn and Manhattan Bridges.
Message me to view today!

details.description:
Welcome to 1496 Bushwick! This spacious and modern 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment offers a comfortable and stylish living space in the vibrant neighborhood of Bushwick. Situated in a well-maintained building, this unit provides an ideal blend of convenience and contemporary living.
Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Bushwick, this apartment places you in the heart of one of Brooklyn's most dynamic areas. Bushwick is renowned for its artistic flair, eclectic dining options, and lively nightlife scene. Explore the neighborhood's trendy cafes, art galleries, and unique boutiques that line the streets. Enjoy the nearby green spaces, such as Maria Hernandez Park, perfect for leisurely strolls or picnics.
Commuting is a breeze with multiple subway stations and bus routes in close proximity, providing easy access to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn. Additionally, the area offers a range of amenities, including supermarkets, pharmacies, and fitness centers, ensuring all your daily needs are met conveniently.
Don't miss the opportunity to call 1496 Bushwick, your new home. Schedule a viewing today and experience the best of Bushwick living in this modern and inviting 2-bedroom apartment!

details.description:
This stunning apartment is located on the fourth floor of a beautifully restored pre-war building in the vibrant neighborhood of Harlem, Manhattan. The unit has 1 bedrooms and 1 bathroom, with high ceilings and large windows that let in plenty of natural light.
The spacious living and dining area features elegant crown molding, hardwood floors, and a decorative fireplace, offering a comfortable space for relaxing and entertaining. The kitchen is fully equipped with modern appliances, including a gas stove, refrigerator, and dishwasher, and has ample counter space and storage.
The bedroom is generously sized and can accommodate a variety of furniture arrangements. The bathroom has been updated with new fixtures and finishes, while still retaining its classic pre-war charm.
The building has a beautifully appointed lobby with original detailing, a virtual doorman, and laundry in the building. It is conveniently located near several subway lines, including the A, B, C, and D, providing easy access to other parts of Manhattan and beyond. There are also many restaurants, cafes, and shops in the area, making it a great neighborhood for those who love to explore.

Both bedrooms are cozy and can accommodate a variety of furniture arrangements. The bathroom has been updated with new fixtures and finishes.
The building is located on a quiet street, just a short walk away from the many restaurants, cafes, and bars in the vibrant neighborhood of Bushwick. It is also conveniently located near several subway lines, including the J and Z trains, providing easy access to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn.

Introducing the Winslow, Astoria?s latest gem and waterfront marvel nestled in the charming Hallets Point neighborhood of Queens
This boutique tower stands as a testament to modern luxury, offering an unparalleled living experience with breathtaking views of both the tranquil waterfront and the iconic New York City skyline. Located in close proximity to buses and the ferry, the Winslow provides convenient access to transportation, ensuring that residents can easily explore the vibrant city beyond. The Winslow sets itself apart with its thoughtfully designed units, boasting spacious layouts, expansive windows, and private balconies in most residences. Revel in the beauty of these homes, featuring meticulously crafted kitchens with high-end appliances and elegantly tiled bathrooms. Each detail has been carefully curated to create a harmonious living space that combines comfort and sophistication.
This premier waterfront tower not only offers stunning residences but also an array of exceptional amenities. Residents can take advantage of convenient parking, secure bike storage, and a dedicated package room. The Winslow goes above and beyond with additional features like a well-equipped gym, game room, and business lounge. The rooftop, adorned with picturesque views and grilling stations, provides the perfect setting for social gatherings. With balconies in most units and a majority enjoying water views, the Winslow promises a lifestyle of tranquility and luxury. As the newest addition to Astoria, a neighborhood known for its proximity to Manhattan coupled with its serene ambiance, the Winslow stands out as a haven of modern living in the heart of the city.
